name: WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce – Light SQL注入漏洞
product: ["WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce \u2013 Light <=2.4.37"]
description: WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce – Light是一款用于WordPress的插件，可以方便地更改WooCommerce和WP电子商务产品的价格。WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce – Light存在SQL注入漏洞。该漏洞源于特殊元素过滤不当。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行恶意SQL语句，获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/excel-like-price-change-for-woocommerce-and-wp-e-commerce-light/
patch: WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce – Light SQL注入漏洞的补丁
